title: WhatsApp
text:
This group was established for the exchanging of prayer requests, messages, greetings, and for streaming our services for those who cannot attend. It is also open to our young people, new members, and visitors to our church.
We, therefore, need to exercise caution with regard to our use of it. So the Church Board at Lodge Causeway respectfully request that we do not post transmissions of news items, controversial issues or other internet material on the Lodge Causeway Family WhatsApp group as that is our policy.
There is much debate and many theories that are transmitted via YouTube and other websites - not all of it is helpful or accurate and be divisive. Therefore, we ask that before you post any transmissions from the internet on the Lodge Causeway Family WhatsApp group that you will send it to the Pastor first so that he can assess the material.
You may, of course, exchange anything with your particular friends for personal discussion but we also need to protect our church family and children from error or contention.
If you have any queries with regard to this, please feel free to discuss them with the elders or Pastor.
Thank you,
LODGE CAUSEWAY CHURCH BOARD

title: Overview
text:
The purpose of this website is to divulge general information relating to formal and informal codes of conduct pertaining to Bristol Lodge Causeway Church.
The comprehensive Seventh Day Adventist (SDA) code of conduct can be reviewed in the Church Manual.
